config.comments: "Use Transactions" creates "gaps" in offsets, which causes problems with consumers (Kafdrop too).This is caused by transaction markers (commit/abort), which spark-streaming-kafka cannot read: Got wrong record ... after seeking to offset ... instead. If this is a compacted topic, consider enabling spark.streaming.kafka.allowNonConsecutiveOffsets.
